name: UCKeyStateRecordsIndex
desc: Provides a count of, and offsets to, dead-key state records in a 'uchr' resource.

items.name: var keyStateRecordCount: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer specifying the number of dead-key state records that are included in the resource.

items.name: var keyStateRecordOffsets: (UInt32)
items.desc: An array of offsets from the beginning of the resource to each of the UCKeyStateRecord values that follow this structure in the 'uchr' resource.

items.name: var keyStateRecordsIndexFormat: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer identifying the format of the UCKeyStateRecordsIndex structure. Set to kUCKeyStateRecordsIndexFormat.
